resources.string:
This map of Cork City features prominent car parks and bicycle stations around the main city area and provides information about them.

• For car parks you can find the amount of free parking spaces, cost to park there, and opening hours. 

• For bicycle stations, you can find how many bikes or bike stands are available.

Timestamps on popups tells when the information was last updated, and can be refreshed via the menu button. Text colour corresponds to how full a car park is, with red signifying almost full while blue is less than half full.

Pinch the map to zoom in/out \u0026 expand/contract clusters. You can also twist to rotate the map. Move two fingers up/down the screen to pitch the map. The map\'s orientation can be reset by tapping the compass icon that appears in the top right of the screen.
Tap these icons to see info!
Zoom into or tap these to see more points on the map!
